answers.answer: No, I don't think so.  You need to call your doctor about these new symptoms.  They may not even be related to your diabetes, but you need to know what is causing them.

question: I have had really good levels for the last week , right at perfect and then all of a sudden my palms and bottoms of my feet have started to itch and my hands are tight and swollen. The hands go numb at night. I am courious, Maybe this has something to do with my body getting use to the new levels?
title: swelling of hands, Itchy palms and bottoms of feet
